ch0246_10_beet/0101_0701_01_10:
Well, well, if it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Look at you, arriving in such a leisurely fashion.
ch0246_10_beet/0101_0701_02_10:
It must take great talent to be that lazy.
I’ll admit you have THAT at least.
ch0246_10_beet/7101_0701_01_10:
While wearing this sygna suit, I—together with
Iron Valiant—shall strive for splendid success.
ch0246_10_beet/7101_0701_02_10:
We’re the perfect advertisement for
sygna suits.
ch0246_10_beet/7101_0701_03_10:
I’m sure the designer who gave me this is
proud, too.
ch0246_10_beet/7102_0701_01_10:
Not much is known about Iron Valiant, but I
plan on carving our names into history.
ch0246_10_beet/7102_0701_02_10:
The two of us working together as a sync
pair will draw out our potential.
ch0246_10_beet/7103_0701_01_10:
People say Iron Valiant is a Pokémon from
the future.
ch0246_10_beet/7103_0701_02_10:
Whether that’s true is debatable, but there’s
one thing I’m sure of:
ch0246_10_beet/7103_0701_03_10:
There’s no better place for it than by my
side as my partner Pokémon.
ch0246_10_beet/7103_0701_04_10:
At the very least, I’ll make sure it’s never
lonely.
ch0246_10_beet/7104_0701_01_10:
My Pokémon aren’t just here to lend me their
power. They also give me memories.
ch0246_10_beet/7104_0701_02_10:
Such memories of me and my Pokémon’s
greatness will be passed down for
generations.
ch0246_10_beet/7104_0701_03_10:
I’m sure Iron Valiant will also give me
memories we’ll both be proud of.
ch0246_10_beet/7105_0701_01_10: You have so much to learn from me.
ch0246_10_beet/7105_0701_02_10:
I’m giving you a rare opportunity to do so.
Be grateful!
ch0246_10_beet/7105_0701_04_10:
I suppose I should admit...I’ve learned a few
things from you too, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0246_10_beet/1701_0701_01_10:
You seem to be trying hard, so I’ll share this
with you.
ch0246_10_beet/1701_0702_01_10:
Keep up the effort. I don’t want my
generosity to go to waste.
ch0246_10_beet/2501_0701_01_10:
Only a few Trainers have become partners
with unknown Pokémon.
ch0246_10_beet/2501_0701_02_10:
If we perform well as a sync pair, our names
will spread in the blink of an eye.
ch0246_10_beet/2501_0701_03_10: We’ll cover Pasio in our color!
ch0246_10_beet/2501_0702_02_10:
Even with an unknown partner Pokémon,
I’ll still draw out every bit of its strength.
ch0246_10_beet/2511_0701_01_10:
It’s hard to imagine what the far-off future
will look like.
ch0246_10_beet/2511_0701_02_10:
If we must think about the future, focusing
on what’s near should be enough.
ch0246_10_beet/2511_0701_03_10:
How we go on to succeed as a sync pair is
most important of all.
ch0246_10_beet/2511_0702_01_10:
Ultimately, what we do will be woven into
history.
ch0246_10_beet/2511_0702_02_10:
I’m sure Trainers of the future will all follow
in my footsteps!
ch0246_10_beet/3001_0701_01_10:
If you want to catch up to me, you should do
something about that sleepy look on your face
first.
ch0246_10_beet/3003_0701_01_10:
I eat alone. If you want lunch, you’re free to do
that on your own.
ch0246_10_beet/3005_0701_01_10:
The stars in the night sky are dim compared
to me and my Pokémon’s brilliance.
